title: 9.06- The Presidential Succession of 1910
itunes:title: 9.06- The Presidential Succession of 1910
description:
After Porfirio Diaz said he welcomed a democratic opposition, many foolishly took him at his word. 

Tour Dates!

Oct 15 -- Toronto -- Ben McNally’s

Oct 16 -- NYC -- The Strand 

Oct 17 -- Nashville -- Parnassus Books

Oct 18 -- Atlanta -- The Carter Library (hosted by A Capella Books)

Come! It's fun!

Sponsor: harrys.com/revolutions
